title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 November 2011 - XWiki
content:
00:29 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
00:32 <Enygma`> has quit  
00:37 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
01:13 <jvdrean> has quit  
01:42 <Denis> has quit  
04:08 <DrLou> has quit  
04:56 <cjdelisl1> is now known as <cjdelisle`>  
04:57 <cjdelisle`> is now known as <cjd>  
05:12 <cjd> is now known as <cjdelisle>  
05:19 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
05:21 <DrLou> has quit  
05:28 <Guest15596> has quit  
07:31 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:43 <tekzilla> has quit  
07:45 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:31 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:32 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <+sburjan`> hello everyone  
10:16 <+sburjan`> vmassol: where di you said that the Dashboard page is created for the documentation ? because I am unable to find it  
10:16 <vmassol> sburjan`: Dashboard app on extensions  
10:16 <vmassol> !seach Dashboard Application  
10:17 <vmassol> !search Dashboard Application  
10:17 <vmassol> first link  
10:17 <+sburjan`> and after that we'll put it here: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome ?  
10:17 <vmassol> :)  
10:17 <vmassol> no  
10:17 <vmassol> it's already there  
10:17 <vmassol> :)  
10:17 <vmassol> automatically  
10:17 <vmassol> well not platofrm  
10:17 <vmassol> but enterprise.xwiki.org  
10:18 <vmassol> we could put it automaitcally on platform too but we need to discuss a few things first  
10:18 <+sburjan`> I really don't like the enreprise wiki.. a lot of useless content before reaching something useful  
10:20 <vmassol> make a proposal to improve it  
10:36 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:38 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <CIA-102> Eduard Moraru master \* r64d32da / (2 files): XWIKI-7153 : Don`t use translation keys from dependencies ...  
12:38 <CIA-102> Eduard Moraru master \* rc7cb67e / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-workspace/xwiki-platform-workspace-template-features/src/main/resources/Main/WebHome.xml : Updated the workspace template Main.WebHome to display the Dashboard using an include macro and not a dashboard macro. - http://git.io/lJmkhA  
12:49 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
12:49 <jvdrean> has quit  
12:54 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
13:27 <mflorea> has quit  
14:21 <vmassol> Enygma`: hi. Do you think you could improve http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Workspace+Application to show full screenshots? For example I don't see an example of the workspaces app home page? Isn't there one?  
14:22 <vmassol> the screenshots you've put don't have much context and it's hard to see how the app integrates with the rest  
14:22 <vmassol> for example I can see a livetable in one of them but I don't know where this livetable is located  
14:36 <vmassol> Enygma`: ping  
14:37 <nIMBVS> has left #xwiki  
14:37 <vmassol> sburjan: something to correct on the dashboard page  
14:37 <vmassol> you shouldn't talk about inline mode  
14:37 <vmassol> the user just need to click on edit  
14:38 <+sburjan> okay. I'll redo the screenshots too  
14:38 <vmassol> he shouldn't (and mustn't) go in advanced mode  
14:38 <+sburjan> from a normal/simple user  
14:38 <+sburjan> I thought you wanted something more technical in the documentation  
14:39 <+sburjan> ok, good that you told me now  
14:39 <vmassol> :)  
14:39 <vmassol> there's only 1 to redo AFAICS  
14:39 <+sburjan> yepp  
14:49 <+Enygma`> vmassol: the Workspace App has the WorkspaceDirectory (a page with a livetable) as homepage  
14:49 <vmassol> Enygma`: fine, but could you update the doc page and screenshots?  
14:49 <vmassol> (I've sent an email about workspaces as XEM but when I looked at the workspace doc page it was very hard for me to see how workspaces look like)  
14:53 <+Enygma`> vmassol: something`s wrong with the Extension Sheet  
14:53 <+Enygma`> the application standard install instructions don`t show up anymore  
14:53 <vmassol> thomas changed things, let me check the workspace page  
14:54 <vmassol> hmm should be o  
14:54 <vmassol> k  
14:54 <vmassol> looks like a bug in the sheet  
14:55 <vmassol> is it hte same for others?  
14:59 <vmassol> Enygma`: I have to go in a meeting now, if you could check the why ExtensionSheet doesn't work then great, otherwise I'll check later (although it will take me some time too since I don't know it anymore - thomas made all the changes to it recently)  
14:59 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* re86b22a / (21 files in 11 dirs): XWIKI-7170: Allow ExtensionRepository implementations to control ...  
14:59 <+Enygma`> ok  
15:07 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <+sburjan> the build seems broken. Downloaded latest snapshot 3.3-20111122.121522-246.zip . Totally broken, a ton of console errors  
15:09 <+sburjan> can't even see the landing page  
15:10 <+sburjan> 2011-11-22 15:59:32.497:WARN::FAILED o.e.j.w.WebAppContext{/xwiki,file:/home/sorinello/Desktop/XWiki/XWiki%203.3/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-3.3-SNAPSHOT/webapps/xwiki/},/home/sorinello/Desktop/XWiki/XWiki 3.3/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-3.3-SNAPSHOT/jetty/../webapps/xwiki: java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Implementing class  
15:10 <+sburjan> 2011-11-22 15:59:32.497:WARN::Unable to reach node goal: started  
15:10 <+sburjan> java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Implementing class  
15:10 <+sburjan> at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)  
15:11 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rfc67d42 / (9 files in 7 dirs): XWIKI-7086: Pressing enter at the end of a paragraph/section doesn't create a new line - http://git.io/LvU3RA  
15:18 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea stable-3.2.x \* rf30a549 / (9 files in 7 dirs): XWIKI-7086: Pressing enter at the end of a paragraph/section doesn't create a new line ...  
15:25 <+Denis> vmassol: I have never receive confirmation of infra ML subscription, but in the meantime I have build a server to run tests, but it when on Jenkins the test fails, on my side it crash FF, any clue ?  
15:26 <+Denis> I am using FF7.0.1 since FF8 is a disaster  
15:27 <+Denis> but anyway, the testUploadImageAfterPreview failed and crash FF, which cause all following test to fail as well  
15:29 <+sburjan> the pages from extensions are cached ? because I deleted and re-uploaded a photo and the old ones still kicks in  
15:38 <+Denis> sburjan: I bet that your browser has a cache  
15:40 <+sburjan> Denis: check the first image, then go to see the attachment from bottom. they are not the same  
15:47 <+Denis> sburjan: curious, I reproduce  
15:49 <+Denis> sburjan: ah no, just being confused by your images, I do not reproduce  
15:49 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* rc60f45e / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/internal/DefaultCoreExtensionScanner.java : XWIKI-7161: Add support for classifier in Maven/Aether repository ...  
15:50 <+sburjan> you shouldn't get an Edit dropdown there, only mouse over edit mode (simple edit mode)  
15:53 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* rfc9e086 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-repositories/xwiki-platform-extension-repository-aether/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/aether/internal/AetherExtensionDependency.java : XWIKI-7161: Add support for classifier in Maven/Aether repository ...  
15:55 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:57 <+Denis> sburjan: ok  
15:57 <+Denis> it is caused by the ?width=  
16:00 <+sburjan> yepp. I guess a caching issue on the server side... I have seen this  
16:35 <evalica> has quit  
17:07 <+sburjan> vmassol: this is for you http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7173 :)  
17:18 <+sburjan> or for any committer willing to click a button :)  
17:45 <nIMBVS> has joined #xwiki  
17:47 <nIMBVS> hi. I have a space which has a ' in it's name and I can't delete it with the "delete space" snippet (http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Delete+Space)  
17:47 <nIMBVS> what can I do to delete it?
